long_description: Not only does the Buck Metro knife look cool attached to your key chain, it stands ready for several handy uses as well. The opening in the knife's oval shape is designed to pop off bottle caps; the outside rim can lift up soda can pop tabs. Metro attaches to a key ring or slides almost unnoticed into a pocket, so you're always prepared. Blade opens and closes easily with 1 hand. Once open, the Buck Metro knife blade secures in place with a locking liner.
short_description: Not only does the Buck Metro knife look cool attached to your key chain, it stands ready for several handy uses as well.
